content.body:
> <@smaug:mozilla.org> hmm, CloseWatchers kind of work in documents which aren't bound to a browsing context? I guess that is just a mistake (or I'm missing some check somewhere)

The check is in https://html.spec.whatwg.org/#dom-closewatcher step 1
content.formatted_body:
In reply to @smaug:mozilla.org
hmm, CloseWatchers kind of work in documents which aren't bound to a browsing context? I guess that is just a mistake (or I'm missing some check somewhere)
The check is in https://html.spec.whatwg.org/#dom-closewatcher step 1

content.body:
> <@domfarolino:matrix.org> OK who is up to date on sequential focus navigation knowledge? I'm reading https://html.spec.whatwg.org/C#sequential-navigation-search-algorithm and I think I've convinced myself that in the algorithm, there is no semantic difference between the "selection mechanism=sequential" and "selection mechanism=DOM" cases. Where am I off? Both seem to get the first (for example) sequentially focusable area in starting point's Document, _after_ starting point, no?

Rakina wrote a good chunk of it, but has been away from that for like 3 years... I can try to page it back in, although it's unclear if I'll get to it before/during TPAC. That stuff is hard.
content.formatted_body:
In reply to @domfarolino:matrix.org
OK who is up to date on sequential focus navigation knowledge? I'm reading https://html.spec.whatwg.org/C#sequential-navigation-search-algorithm and I think I've convinced myself that in the algorithm, there is no semantic difference between the "selection mechanism=sequential" and "selection mechanism=DOM" cases. Where am I off? Both seem to get the first (for example) sequentially focusable area in starting point's Document, after starting point, no?
Rakina wrote a good chunk of it, but has been away from that for like 3 years... I can try to page it back in, although it's unclear if I'll get to it before/during TPAC. That stuff is hard.

content.body: smaug: ah yep, there's an assertion failure there... please file an issue and I'll fix!
content.formatted_body: smaug: ah yep, there's an assertion failure there... please file an issue and I'll fix!

content.body: I wonder what other steps are strange with non-fully-active documents.
Domenic: OK I've added you as the reviewer for https://github.com/whatwg/html/pull/10632 instead. Thanks for "volunteering" hehe
content.formatted_body: Domenic: OK I've added you as the reviewer for https://github.com/whatwg/html/pull/10632 instead. Thanks for "volunteering" hehe

content.body: hsivonen: I'm thinking I'll give people until after TPAC to comment on the whatwg/encoding PR before merging. Even though I don't really expect any opposition it's still a big change of sorts so it seems kinda warranted. And I'd rather not have to revisit once it lands.
